title: Minor timetable adjustments for Lilydale bus services
articleContent:
Minor timetable adjustments for Lilydale bus services

From Sunday 30 January 2022, there will be minor timetable adjustments for Lilydale bus routes 683, 684 and 685 to allow for better train connections from the new Lilydale bus interchange.

Passengers can check their new timetables now:

  • Route 683 – Chirnside Park – Warburton via Lilydale Station & Seville & Yarra Junction
  • Route 684 – Eildon – Melbourne via Lilydale Station
  • Route 685 – Lilydale – Healesville via Lilydale Station & Coldstream & Yarra Glen

The first trip of the Route 685 service from Don Road will depart five minutes later at 5.35am.

Route 673 Lilydale – Lilydale Lake will be discontinued. Route 673 passengers are advised to catch Route 663 Belgrave - Lilydale via Kallista & The Patch & Monbulk and Route 680 Lilydale - Mooroolbark via Lilydale East Estate & Lakeview Estate.

Passengers who would normally board at the Lilydale Lake Community Centre will need to use the alternative bus stop located a 200-metre walk from the Centre on Swansea Street.

Route 673 last service will run on Saturday 29 January 2022.

To plan your journey, visit Journey planner or call 1800 800 007 to order a printed copy of your timetable.
articleDescription: From Jan 2022, there will be minor timetable adjustments for Lilydale bus routes 683, 684 and 685 to allow for better train connections.
